RuleDetails.Rules:
Admin Fee: Change & Refund IRR 300,000
Lufthansa & Austrian Airlines: IRR 900,000 
Refund: After 3 Working Days

FOR FARES WITH FOOTNOTE 1O   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
SPECIAL PROMO IRAN EXCURSION FARE
 APPLICATION
   CLASS OF SERVICE
     THESE FARES APPLY FOR BUSINESS/ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE.
   TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
     THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES.
     FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
     ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/CIRCLE-TRIP/OPEN-JAW/SINGLE OPEN-
     JAW/DOUBLE OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS.
 CAPACITY LIMITATIONS
   THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED
   ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH
   FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS.
   THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE
   AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE
   CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT
 OTHER CONDITIONS
   ONE-WAY TRAVEL ALLOWED AT 60 PERCENTAGE OF RT
   FARE.
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

FOR FARES WITH FOOTNOTE 1O
 
  TRAVEL FROM LAST INTERNATIONAL STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO
  LATER THAN 2 MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

FOR FARES WITH FOOTNOTE 1O
 
  OUTBOUND -
    TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 16MAR 17 THROUGH 28MAR 17.

TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/AFTER 05JAN 17 AND ON/BEFORE
  30JUN 17.
 
  TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON TG  AND MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN
  IRAN,ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF
         NOTE -
          TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON BOTH THE PLATE AND
          STOCK OF TG.

VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/AFTER 05JAN 17 AND ON/
  BEFORE 30JUN 17.

RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS.
  WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
         NOTE -
          OPEN SECTOR NOT PERMITTED FOR TICKETING.
          RESERVATIONS WITHOUT TICKET NUMBERS CAN BE
          CANCELLED BY THE CARRIER.DUE TO AUTOMATED
          TICKETING DEADLINE CONTROL DIFFERENCE COULD EXIST
          BETWEEN THE FARE RULE LAST TICKETING DATE AND THE
          SYSTEM GENERATED TICKETING DEADLINE MESSAGE.THE
          MORE RESTRICTIVE TICKETING DEADLINE APPLIES.

IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN THR AND BKK
      THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY TG FLIGHT OPERATED BY TG.
  AND
  IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN AUSTRALIA
  AND NEW ZEALAND
      THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY VA FLIGHT OPERATED BY VA
        ANY NZ FLIGHT OPERATED BY NZ.
  AND
  IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL WITHIN NEW ZEALAND
      THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY VA FLIGHT OPERATED BY VA
        ANY NZ FLIGHT OPERATED BY NZ.
  AND
  IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL WITHIN AUSTRALIA
      THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY VA FLIGHT OPERATED BY VA
        ANY NZ FLIGHT OPERATED BY NZ.
  AND
  IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN AKL AND
  FIJI/NEW CALEDONIA
      THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY NZ FLIGHT OPERATED BY NZ.
  AND
  IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN AKL AND
  FRENCH POLYNESIA
      THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY NZ FLIGHT OPERATED BY NZ.
  AND
  IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL WITHIN INDONESIA
      THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY GA FLIGHT OPERATED BY GA.
  AND
  IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN BKK AND AREA
  3
      THEN THAT TRAVEL MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY TG FLIGHT OPERATED BY TG.

ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
        TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH
  OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE
         FARE.
             TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH
  OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 20 PERCENT OF
         THE FARE.
             TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN.
         NOTE -
          UNACCOMPANIED MINORS ARE NOT PERMITTED AT THESE
          FARES.
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

2 FREE STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT
       1 IN BKK IN EACH DIRECTION.

FOR FARES WITH FOOTNOTE 1O   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
 
  2 FREE TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT
      1 FREE IN BKK IN EACH DIRECTION
    FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED ON
     THE FARE COMPONENT.

THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED -
  VLD ON TG FLTS ONLY/NONEND - AND -/RERTE/RFD USD 40/RFD W/
  I - AND - 90D AFTR EXP REF ISSU - AND - OFC/RFND REF ISSU
  OFC - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

FOR FARES WITH FOOTNOTE 1O
 
 
         NOTE -
          ALL FEE IS NOT COMMISSIONABLE.
          CHANGES
          BEFORE AND AFTER DEPARTURE
          NO SHOW
          ALTERNATIVE
           NO SHOW CHARGES NIL
          CHANGE FLIGHT/DATE/RBD/ROUTING MUST BE MADE
          BEFORE TICKET EXPIRATION
          1.FLIGHT DATE CHANGE WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY
          RBD D/J/H-PERMITTED WITHOUT CHARGE .
          RBD Q/T/K/V/W-PERMITTED WITH FEE USD 40 FREE OF
          CHARGE FOR INFANT.
          2. CHANGING DATE ON OUTBOUND SECTOR FROM ORIGINAL
          BOOKING TO EARLIER DEPARTURE
          RBD D/J/H-PERMITTED WITHOUT CHARGE .
          RBD Q/T/K/V/W-PERMITTED WITH FEE USD 40 FREE OF
          CHARGE FOR INFANT.
          3. CHANGING DATE AFTER DEPARTURE
          RBD D/J/H-PERMITTED WITHOUT CHARGE .
          RBD Q/T/K/V/W-PERMITTED WITH FEE USD 40 FREE OF
          CHARGE FOR INFANT.
           4.REROUTING
          RBD D/J/H-PERMITTED WITH FEE USD 40. DIFFERENCE
          IN FARE AND TAXES AND SURCHARGES SHOULD BE
          COLLECTED
          RBD Q/T/K/V/W-PERMITTED WITH FEE USD 40.
          DIFFERENCE IN FARE AND TAXES AND SURCHARGES
          SHOULD BE COLLECTED
          5. REISSUING
          -PERMITTED.
          6.CHANGE TO HIGHER FARES  TICKET MUST BE REISSUED
          COLLECT ADDITIONAL FARE/TAXES/SURCHARGES WITH
          -PERMITTED.
          7.CHANGE TO LOWER RBD FARE IS NOT PERMITTED
          THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE APPLIED ORIGINAL
          TICKETING RULES AND CONDITIONS
          8.NAME CHANGE/CORRECTION
          FOR TOTALLY UNUSED TICKET
          -NOT PERMITTED.
          FOR PARTIAL USED TICKET
          -NOT PERMITTED
          CANCELLATIONS/REFUNDS
          TOTALLY UNUSED TICKET
          -PERMITTED WITH A CHARGE OF USD 40
           REFUND FOR PARTIALLY USED TICKET
          -PARTIALLY USED TICKET  REFUND IF ANY WILL BE THE
          DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND THE
          APPLICABLE FARE FOR THE TRAVEL COMPLETED LESS
          REFUND FEE USD 40 FOR ADULT USD 40 FOR CHILDREN
          FREE OF CHARGE FOR INFANT. A ONE-WAY FARE MAY BE
          USED IN THE REFUND ASSESSMENT PROVIDED ALL
          CONDITIONS OF THAT FARE HAVE BEEN MET. WAIVED
           FOR IRREGULARITY OPERATION-FREE OF CHARGE.
          TG MAY REFUSE REFUND IF APPLICATION IS MADE LATER
          THAN 90 DAYS AFTER EXPIRY OF E-TICKETS/EMDS
          GENERAL INFORMATION  NOT APPLY.

FOR ONE WAY FARES
   SINGLE/DOUBLE OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS NOT
   PERMITTED.
   END-ON-END NOT PERMITTED. SIDE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED
   APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN
   MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23.

THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY FOR
  STOPOVERS.
  AND - THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY
        FOR CONNECTIONS.

THIS FARE MUST NOT BE USED AS THE HIGH OR THE LOW FARE
  WHEN CALCULATING A DIFFERENTIAL. THIS FARE MUST NOT BE
  USED AS THE THROUGH FARE WHEN PRICING A FARE COMPONENT
  WITH A DIFFERENTIAL.
         NOTE -
          1. FULL AND SEQUENT USE OF FLT COUPONS. TKT IS
          NOT VALID IF THE 1ST COUPON HAS NOT BEEN USED AND
          WILL NOT BE HONORED IF ALL COUPONS ARE NOT USED
          IN THE SEQUENCE PROVIDED IN THE E-TKT. VALIDITY
          EXTENSION IS NOT APPLICABLE.
          2. MILEAGE ACCRUAL FOR ROP MAY VARY SUBJECT TO TG
          TERMS AND CONDITIONS.
          3.ALL TAXES/CHARGES ARE EXCLUDED AND WILL BE ADDED
          TO THE FARE AND ARE NOT COMMISSIONABLE.
          FARE AND CONDITIONS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE/REVISE
          WITH/WITHOUT PRIOR NOTICE.
